00018 TEST(BasicTests, ConstantBasic) {
00019 
00020 
00021     boost::shared_ptr<Output> outputModel(new Output(44100, 8));
00022 
00023     Constant a(outputModel); 
00024 
00025     EXPECT_EQ(a.getName(), "Constant");
00026 
00027 
00028     // set parameter by parameter name value
00029     a.setParameter(a.parameterNameValue, 2.5);
00030 
00031     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(0.0), 2.5);
00032     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(0.5), 2.5);
00033     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSample(0.55), 2.5);
00034  
00035 
00036     // set a different value
00037     a.setParameter(a.parameterNameValue, 300);
00038     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(0.0), 300);
00039

00041 }
